mapper.insert: insert into orders (number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, pay_method, amount, pay_status, phone, address, consignee, tableware_number, tableware_status, pack_amount, rejection_reason, cancel_reason, cancel_time, checkout_time, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_time, remark, user_name, delivery_status) values (#{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{payMethod}, #{amount}, #{payStatus}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{consignee}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus}, #{packAmount}, #{rejectionReason}, #{cancelReason}, #{cancelTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryTime}, #{remark}, #{userName}, #{deliveryStatus})
